rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Zombie creature token with lifelink and decayed. [i](A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Sacrifice two creatures: Draw a card and you lose 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.
